name: Guards of the Gate (itch)
description:
Guards of the Gate is a rogue-like RPG game with turn based battles on hexagonal fields. You control a team of heroes aka Guards of the Gate, who are trying to save the world from the evil Dragon Lord.

Development status

This is the first public beta test verison: it's contains the first 4 level. In every few weeks new contents will be added. Bugs and glitches can appear, please report them. Every feedback is welcome!

Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/princegamestd
